name: TheGrandNational
0:
”Alexa, open The Grand National”
”Alexa, ask The Grand National to pick me a horse”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the grand national
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Love to watch the Grand National but not sure which horse to pick? Let Alexa do it for you!

Just launch the skill and Alexa will suggest a horse.

Don't like Alexa's suggestion? Just say "another".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
